title: Her Run
description: This is a Stand Alone Book in the Her Series.Going undercover for the FBI, I use contacts I made while in the Marines to get one step closer to a murderer. However, I quickly discover there is a whole lot more to the story than I anticipated. Nothing is what it appeared to be. Having the President gone, leaves me in charge of the Tormented Souls Motorcycle Club. it's nothing I can't handle until a fiery little thing shows up throwing off everything, especially my head. I tried to stay away, but couldn't. I never thought she'd be the one to ruin everything. **WARNING: CONTAINS ADULT CONTENT. Please pass if you can't handle explicit, panty melting sex or vulgar language.**
author: Rachael Orman
